actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 4:30 p.m. on September 1, 2023.
The House observed a moment of silence in rememberance of the servicemembers who were lost their lives during the terrorist boming in Kabul, Afghanistan, on August 26, 2021.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Reverend Stephanie Vader, Capitol Hill United Methodist Church, Washington, DC.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Darrell Issa to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
